system.description:
The @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-edges.Item.TJwk3WEdmfT4YqeL]{soulknife} may change the form of his @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-abilities.Item.Q7vEwImap0FspKU7]{mind blade} as a limited action. He can shape the mind blade to replicate a @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-edges.Item.DHeMliHrqD1jyyeM]{long sword} or a @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-edges.Item.Sh2PXadsSUGdyAcW]{great sword} (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc.JournalEntry.swadefcp02gear00.JournalEntryPage.02meleeweapons00]{Melee Weapons} in the Fantasy Companion).

The soulknife also has the option of splitting his mind blade into short swords, one for wielding in each hand. Off-hand and wielding two weapons at once still apply, unless the soulknife has @UUID[Compendium.swade-core-rules.swade-edges.Item.OJ4t6S1cGamjJiLD]{Ambidextrous} or @UUID[Compendium.savage-eberron.eberron-edges.Item.fmPS2GyZFKN2lVda]{Two-Fisted} respectively.
